name: HtmlItems
shortdesc: A collection of embedded HTML page items.

parameter.name: layer
parameter.shortdesc: The layer on which to create the HtmlItem. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: at
parameter.shortdesc: The location at which to insert the HtmlItem relative to the reference object or within the container object. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: reference
parameter.shortdesc: The reference object. Note: Required when the at parameter is before or after. Can accept: Document, Spread, MasterSpread, Page, Layer or PageItem. &#40;Optional)

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new HtmlItem &#40;Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the HtmlItem.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the HtmlItem with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the HtmlItem with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the HtmlItem with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the HtmlItems within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The HtmlItem, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: HtmlItem, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The HtmlItem, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: HtmlItem, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first HtmlItem in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last HtmlItem in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle HtmlItem in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the HtmlItem with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the HtmlItem that follows the desired HtmlItem.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the HtmlItem whose index follows the specified HtmlItem in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The HtmlItem whose index comes before the desired HtmlItem.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any HtmlItem in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every HtmlItem in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the HtmlItem.
Returns the HtmlItem with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
